#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
LL gcd(LL a,LL b){return (b)?gcd(b,a%b):a;}
LL max(LL a,LL b){return (a>b)?a:b;}
LL min(LL a,LL b){return (a<b)?a:b;}
int main()
{
 LL T,p,q,g;
 cin>>T;
 while(T--)
 {
  cin>>p>>q;
  g=gcd(max(p,q),min(p,q));
  p/=g;
  q/=g;
  if(p>2*q)
   cout<<"NO\n";
  else
  {
   if((q&(q+1))==0&&(p&(p-1))==0)
    cout<<"YES\n";
   else
    if(p==1)
    {
     while(q%2==0)q>>=1;
     if((q&(q+1))==0)
      cout<<"YES\n";
     else
      cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    else
    cout<<"NO\n";
  }
 }
 return 0;
}
